players.name: Alice
memory:
Bob: "Discover the truth, Diana is mafia.
I'm investigating to protect the town."
Diana: "Be careful, Bob seems to be on the scent. Keep your guard up."
Bob: "Be cautious, the situation is more complex than it seems. I will continue to investigate and protect the town."
You: "I will keep an open mind but remain vigilant. Let's work together to uncover the truth."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
